title: Part A

1 point is earned for using g(0) = 5

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for identifying x = 0, 2, 3

1 point is earned for explanation

The graph of y = g(x) has points of inflection at x = 0, x = 2, and x = 3 because g' changes from increasing to decreasing at x = 0 and x = 3, and g' changes from decreasing to increasing at x = 2.
descriptions:

1 point is earned for explanation

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
​1 point is earned for h'(x)

1 point is earned for identifying x = 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaOaaaeaaca aIYaaaleqaaaaa@36CD@ , 3

1 point is earned for answer for 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaOaaaeaaca aIYaaaleqaaaaa@36CD@ with analysis

1 point is earned for answer for 3 with analysis

​ h ′ ( x )= g ′ ( x )−x=0⇒ g ′ ( x )=x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@497F@

On the interval −2≤x≤2,  g ′ ( x )= 4− x 2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46F4@

On this interval, g ′ ( x )=x when x= 2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@@440F@

The only other solution to g'(x) = x is x = 3.

h ′ ( x )= g ′ ( x )−x>0 for 0≤x< 2 h ′ ( x )= g ′ ( x )−x≤0 for  2 <x≤5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@60D2@

​Therefore h has a relative maximum at x = 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaOaaaeaaca aIYaaaleqaaaaa@36CD@ , and h has neither a minimum nor a maximum at x = 3.
